post:
I've got a server at OVH I don't want to get rid of since you can't get them anymore, was looking if anyone was interested in sharing it with me for regular VPS or Seedbox purposes.

2 Cores
300 GB HDD
15 TB Bandwidth
1 GB Dedicated Ram 
1 IPv4

$12/month

Specs can be tweaked slightly depending on needs, let me know if you're interested.
